columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the bastion host.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a bastion host uniquely.

columns.name: dns_name
columns.description: FQDN for the endpoint on which bastion host is accessible.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the bastion host resource.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the bastion host.

columns.name: ip_configurations
columns.description: IP configuration of the bastion host resource.
